abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Emergency School
            Reconstruction Project for Haiti is to assist the recipient
            in restoring and improving access to basic education in
            selected destroyed and/or heavily damaged public primary
            schools of its territory. The proposed extension is
            necessary primarily to allow completion of the school
            construction activities which were delayed, first due to the
            2010 earthquake, and subsequently due to additional
            complications on construction sites and a disruptive rainy
            season in 2011. The borrower has established an updated and
            realistic action plan for completion of these activities. It
            is expected that works will be completed on all schools by
            end of March 2012. This will be the first extension of the project.
